trans-unit.source: Defines the relationship between a data item and the node it is binding to in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 定義資料項目及它所繫結中的節點之間的關聯性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source where each data item contains multiple fields (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項繫結至資料來源，其中每個資料項目都包含多個欄位 （例如具有數個屬性的 XML 元素），節點會顯示所傳回的值`ToString`資料項目的 預設的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree, but is not very useful otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 在 XML 項目，該節點會顯示項目名稱，其中顯示基礎結構的樹狀目錄中，不過沒有非常有用。

trans-unit.source: You can bind the properties of a node to a specific field by specifying tree node bindings.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由指定樹狀節點繫結，節點的屬性繫結至特定欄位。

trans-unit.source: A TreeNodeBinding object defines the relationship between each data item and the node that it is binding to.
trans-unit.target: TreeNodeBinding 物件會定義每個資料項目及它所繫結的節點之間的關聯性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control stores its TreeNodeBinding objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> property and applies the bindings to the data source to create a one-to-one relationship between the tree hierarchy and the data source hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項儲存其 TreeNodeBinding 物件中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>屬性及套用繫結至資料來源建立樹狀階層和資料來源階層之間的一對一關聯性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: For each data item in the data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control attempts to match the data item to a TreeNodeBinding object in order to create the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 在資料來源中，每個資料項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制會嘗試比對才能建立對應的資料項目 TreeNodeBinding 物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When creating a TreeNodeBinding object, you must specify the criteria for binding.
trans-unit.target: 建立 TreeNodeBinding 物件時，您必須指定繫結準則。

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node.
trans-unit.target: 準則表示當資料的項目應該繫結到節點。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>屬性或這兩個屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is a slight performance gain by specifying both.
trans-unit.target: 指定這兩者沒有輕微的效能改善。

trans-unit.source: A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound.
trans-unit.target: 節點深度指定節點層級取得繫結。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following TreeNodeBinding declaration binds the `Name` and `ID` fields of the data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0: ``` <asp:TreeNodeBinding Depth="0" TextField="Name" ValueField="ID"> ``` A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列 TreeNodeBinding 宣告繫結`Name`和`ID`的資料來源欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性，分別的深度為 0 的所有節點︰``` <asp:TreeNodeBinding Depth="0" TextField="Name" ValueField="ID"> ```資料成員基礎資料來源中，指定資料的項目類型，但可以代表不同的資訊，根據資料來源。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=fullName> interface) exposes a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which specifies the type of the data item.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料來源中的項目階層式資料 (由<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=fullName>介面) 會公開<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，指定資料的項目類型。</xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，資料成員的 XML 項目會指定項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use.
trans-unit.target: 當資料來源包含多個資料項目類型時，資料成員會指定哪些資料的項目類型使用。

trans-unit.source: The following TreeNodeBinding declaration binds the `<Book>` elements of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control to all the nodes in the tree, regardless of the location in the hierarchy: ``` <asp:TreeNodeBinding DataMember="Book" TextField="Title" ValueField= "ISBN"> ``` Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: 下列 TreeNodeBinding 宣告繫結`<Book>`的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>樹狀目錄中，不論在階層中的位置中的所有節點的控制項︰``` <asp:TreeNodeBinding DataMember="Book" TextField="Title" ValueField= "ISBN"> ```一旦建立繫結準則時，您就可以繫結的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>值可繫結的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以繫結至資料項目的欄位，或為靜態值。

trans-unit.source: When bound to a static value, all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the TreeNodeBinding object is applied share the same value.
trans-unit.target: 當繫結至靜態值，所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>TreeNodeBinding 物件套用的物件共用相同的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override a bound property in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object by setting the corresponding property directly in the node.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地覆寫中的繫結的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>藉由直接在節點中設定對應的屬性物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties of the TreeNodeBinding class that allow you to bind a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data item.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的屬性 TreeNodeBinding 類別可讓您將屬性繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>資料項目欄位的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBinding object that defines and matches both a depth and a data member.
trans-unit.target: TreeNodeBinding 物件定義，並相符項目深度和資料成員。

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBinding object that defines and matches the data member only.
trans-unit.target: TreeNodeBinding 物件會定義並比對資料成員。

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBinding object that defines and matches the depth only.
trans-unit.target: 定義並相符項目深度只 TreeNodeBinding 物件。

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBinding object that defines neither the depth nor the data member.
trans-unit.target: 深度或資料成員都不會定義 TreeNodeBinding 物件。

trans-unit.source: (This type of tree node binding is applied to all nodes in the tree.) 5.
trans-unit.target: （這種類型的樹狀節點繫結套用到所有的節點在樹狀目錄中）。 5.

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBinding object that does not have a match in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源中沒有相符項目 TreeNodeBinding 物件。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item is then bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties of the nodes to which the TreeNodeBinding object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，所傳回的值`ToString`資料項目的方法則繫結到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>TreeNodeBinding 物件套用到節點的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeBinding class also allows you to format the text that is displayed in a node by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: TreeNodeBinding 類別也可讓您設定藉由設定節點中顯示的文字格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.FormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use the TreeNodeBinding constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用 TreeNodeBinding 建構函式來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>的新執行個體

trans-unit.source: It is often used when dynamically populating the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 它通常用於動態擴展時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value to match against a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for a data item to determine whether to apply the tree node binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要比對值<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName>資料項目來判斷是否要套用的樹狀結構節點繫結的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 資料成員基礎資料來源中，指定資料的項目類型，但可以代表不同的資訊，根據資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=fullName> object) exposes a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which specifies the type of the data item.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料來源中的項目階層式資料 (由<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=fullName>物件) 會公開<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，指定資料的項目類型。</xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，資料成員的 XML 項目會指定項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use.
trans-unit.target: 當資料來源包含多個資料項目類型時，資料成員會指定哪些資料的項目類型使用。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> declaration binds the `<Book>` elements of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control to all the nodes in the tree, regardless of the location in the hierarchy: ``` <asp:TreeNodeBinding DataMember="Book" TextField="Title" ValueField= "ISBN"> ``` When creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object, you must specify the criteria for binding.
trans-unit.target: 下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>宣告繫結`<Book>`的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>樹狀目錄中，不論在階層中的位置中的所有節點的控制項︰``` <asp:TreeNodeBinding DataMember="Book" TextField="Title" ValueField= "ISBN"> ```建立時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件，您必須指定繫結準則。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node.
trans-unit.target: 準則表示當資料的項目應該繫結到節點。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or DataMember property, or both properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>DataMember 屬性或這兩個屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is a slight performance gain by specifying both.
trans-unit.target: 指定這兩者沒有輕微的效能改善。

trans-unit.source: Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: 一旦建立繫結準則時，您就可以繫結的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>值可繫結的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以繫結至資料項目的欄位，或為靜態值。

trans-unit.source: When bound to a static value, all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied share the same value.
trans-unit.target: 當繫結至靜態值，所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用共用相同的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The value to match against a data item's <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether to apply the tree node binding.
trans-unit.target: 要比對的資料項目值<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性來判斷是否要套用的樹狀結構節點繫結。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the DataMember property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未設定 DataMember 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the node depth at which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定節點深度的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound.
trans-unit.target: 節點深度指定節點層級取得繫結。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> declaration binds the `Name` and `ID` fields of the data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0: ``` <asp:TreeNodeBinding Depth="0" TextField="Name" ValueField="ID"> ``` When creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object, you must specify the criteria for binding.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>宣告繫結`Name`和`ID`的資料來源欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性，分別的深度為 0 的所有節點︰``` <asp:TreeNodeBinding Depth="0" TextField="Name" ValueField="ID"> ```建立時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件，您必須指定繫結準則。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicates when a data item should be bound to a node.
trans-unit.target: 準則表示當資料的項目應該繫結到節點。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the Depth or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定深度或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>屬性或這兩個屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is a slight performance gain by specifying both.
trans-unit.target: 指定這兩者沒有輕微的效能改善。

trans-unit.source: Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: 一旦建立繫結準則時，您就可以繫結的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>值可繫結的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以繫結至資料項目的欄位，或為靜態值。

trans-unit.source: When bound to a static value, all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied share the same value.
trans-unit.target: 當繫結至靜態值，所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用共用相同的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The node depth at which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 節點深度<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, indicating that the Depth property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為-1，表示深度屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the text of a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，指定目標節點的文字的顯示格式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The FormatString property is used to provide a custom format for a node's text.
trans-unit.target: FormatString 屬性用來提供自訂格式的節點的文字。

trans-unit.source: The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }.
trans-unit.target: 資料格式字串由兩個部分組成，在表單中，以冒號分隔的 { `A` : `Bxx` }。

trans-unit.source: For example, the formatting string `{0:F2}` displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 例如，格式化字串`{0:F2}`會顯示兩個小數位數定點數字。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 整個字串必須括在大括號來表示其為格式字串，而不是常值字串。

trans-unit.source: Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text.
trans-unit.target: 大括號以外的任何文字會顯示為常值文字。

trans-unit.source: The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 冒號之前的值 (`A`一般範例中) 以零為起始的參數清單中，指定的參數索引。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This value can be set only to 0 because there is only one value in each node.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個值可以設定只為 0，因為每個節點中只有一個值。

trans-unit.source: The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the display format for the value.
trans-unit.target: 冒號後面的字元 (`B`一般範例中) 指定值的顯示格式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the common formats.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出常見的格式。

trans-unit.source: |Format character|Displays numeric values in| |----------------------|--------------------------------| |`C`|Currency format.| |`D`|Decimal format.| |`E`|Scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|Fixed format.| |`G`|General format.| |`N`|Number format.| |`X`|Hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > Except for `X`, the format character is not case sensitive.
The `X` format character displays the hexadecimal characters in the case that is specified.
trans-unit.target: `X`格式字元會顯示在指定的情況下的十六進位字元。

trans-unit.source: The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display.
trans-unit.target: 格式字元後的值 (`xx`一般範例中) 指定有效位數或小數位數，若要顯示的數目。

trans-unit.source: For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何格式化字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The value of the FormatString property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: FormatString 屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the text of a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 指定的節點的文字的顯示格式的格式化字串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the FormatString property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未設定 [FormatString] 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text for the image that is displayed next to a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定節點的旁邊是否顯示出的映像的工具提示文字<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the ImageToolTip property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用 ImageToolTip 屬性所指定的值繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的文字會提供可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的映像的描述的輔助技術裝置。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: When an image is displayed next to a node, the ToolTip text is displayed when the mouse pointer is positioned over the image.
trans-unit.target: 在節點旁邊顯示映像時，當滑鼠指標停留在影像上時，會顯示工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override the ImageToolTip property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地設定覆寫 ImageToolTip 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the ImageToolTip property to bind the same ToolTip text to each node image, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 除了使用 ImageToolTip 屬性所繫結至每個節點映像的相同的工具提示文字，您可以繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>藉由設定資料來源的欄位物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTipField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for the image that is displayed next to a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 節點的旁邊是否顯示出的映像的工具提示文字<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未設定 P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要繫結至資料來源的欄位名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip*>屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref>物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the ImageToolTipField property to specify the field name to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用 ImageToolTipField 屬性指定欄位名稱，即可將繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的文字會提供可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的映像的描述的輔助技術裝置。

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: When an image is displayed next to a node, the ToolTip text is displayed when the mouse pointer is positioned over the image.
trans-unit.target: 在節點旁邊顯示映像時，當滑鼠指標停留在影像上時，會顯示工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override the ImageToolTipField property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地設定覆寫 ImageToolTipField 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the ImageToolTipField property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property to a fixed value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用 ImageToolTipField 屬性要繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件欄位中，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性設定為固定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果資料來源包含多個欄位，您必須先設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>屬性或這兩個屬性，才能繫結至適當的欄位。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the ImageUrl property to specify a custom image to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用 ImageUrl 屬性指定繫結至自訂映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The image is displayed next to a node and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can override the image for an individual node by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 可以設定覆寫個別節點的映像及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>屬性直接。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.target: 當顯示節點的 ImageUrl 屬性旁的映像時，您也應該考慮設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ImageToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的工具提示文字會提供可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的映像的描述的輔助技術裝置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied is populated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要節點<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用動態擴展。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input.
trans-unit.target: 某些情況下，它並不實用靜態地預先定義的資料大小，或根據使用者輸入的自訂內容的樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control supports dynamic node population.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個緣故，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項支援動態節點母體擴展。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When the PopulateOnDemand property is set to `true`, the child nodes of the node that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied to gets populated at run time when the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 當 PopulateOnDemand 屬性設定為`true`，節點的子節點的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用到取得在執行階段時展開節點填入。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: When data bindings are created by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.AutoGenerateDataBindings%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to `true`, the bindings that are created have the PopulateOnDemand property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結所設定的建立時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.AutoGenerateDataBindings%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制權傳輸至`true`，所建立的繫結有屬性設為 PopulateOnDemand `true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.AutoGenerateDataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: Data bindings that are created declaratively have the PopulateOnDemand property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 以宣告方式建立的資料繫結有屬性設為 PopulateOnDemand `false`。

trans-unit.source: Using the declarative syntax allows you to control the behavior of individual data bindings.
trans-unit.target: 使用宣告式語法可讓您控制個別的資料繫結的行為。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Unlike the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> class, the PopulateOnDemand property does not require an event-handling method to be defined for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event, if you are using a data source control, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 不同於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>類別，PopulateOnDemand 屬性不需要定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>事件，如果您使用資料來源控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>事件處理方法</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control dynamically generates an event-handling method using the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項動態產生的事件處理方法，使用的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can still define an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event; however, it will be called after the event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 您仍然可以定義的事件處理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>事件; 不過，它會呼叫之後的事件處理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>

trans-unit.source: Supported browsers can also take advantage of client-side node population.
trans-unit.target: 支援的瀏覽器也可以利用用戶端節點母體擴展。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this allows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to populate a node dynamically on the client when that node is expanded, preventing the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 啟用時，這可讓<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項來擴展以動態方式在用戶端上的節點展開該節點時，這樣就不需要回傳至伺服器。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: For more information on client-side node population, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關用戶端節點母體擴展的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to populate the node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied dynamically; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要填入的節點<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用動態，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the event or events to raise when a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定事件或事件引發時的節點<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用已選取。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the SelectAction property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用 SelectAction 屬性指定的值繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property is used to specify which event or events are raised when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>屬性用來指定選取的節點時引發的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override the SelectAction property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地設定覆寫 SelectAction 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available options.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的選項。

trans-unit.source: |`SelectAction` value|Description| |--------------------------|-----------------| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand`|Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: |`SelectAction`值 |描述 | |--------------------------|-----------------| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand`|切換展開或摺疊節點。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> event or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> event, as appropriate.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`|Raises no events when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Select`|Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`|Raises both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>事件或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed>事件，視。 | |`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`|會引發任何事件，選取節點時。 | |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Select`|引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>事件選取節點時。 | |`TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`|引發兩者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>選取節點時的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>

trans-unit.source: Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: 只會展開節點，不會摺疊。 | > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>的節點不會呈現其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>屬性設定為`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_TreeNodeSelectAction.Select" name="TreeNodeSelectAction.Select" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a check box is displayed next to a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出的節點旁是否顯示核取方塊<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: To provide multinode selection support in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, you can display check boxes next to an image in the node.
trans-unit.target: 延展的多重節點選取項目中提供支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項，您可以在節點中顯示映像旁的核取方塊。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the ShowCheckBox property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用 ShowCheckBox 屬性指定的值繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property is used to show or hide the check box for a node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>屬性用來顯示或隱藏節點的核取方塊。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although the ShowCheckBox property can be used to display check boxes, it is more common to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ShowCheckBox 屬性可以用來顯示核取方塊，雖然更常見的是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property affects every node type that is specified by the property; therefore, the ShowCheckBox property is often used to override that setting for a node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>屬性會影響屬性所指定的每個節點類型; 因此，ShowCheckBox 屬性通常用來覆寫該設定，讓節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the ShowCheckBox property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地設定覆寫 ShowCheckBox 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property is used to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content that is linked to a node when that node is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>屬性用來指定視窗或框架中顯示 Web 內容的連結節點時，按一下該節點。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the Target property overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control for the nodes to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定目標屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>節點的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the Target property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地設定覆寫的目標屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Target property renders as a `target` attribute.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Target 屬性轉譯成`target`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition.
trans-unit.target: `target`屬性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許項目。

trans-unit.source: Do not set the Target property, if the rendered output for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> control must be XHTML 1.1 compliant.
trans-unit.target: 未設定目標屬性，如果轉譯的輸出為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>控制項必須符合 XHTML 1.1。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > > When creating accessible Web pages, you should avoid using the Target property to target another window.
trans-unit.target: >> 時建立可存取網頁，您應該避免使用的目標屬性指向另一個視窗。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB: ASP.NET 網頁可及性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.
trans-unit.target: 目標視窗或框架，其中顯示連結的 Web 網頁內容。

trans-unit.source: Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 值必須以字母開頭的 A 到 Z 範圍中 （不區分大小寫），但下表所示，以底線開頭的某些特殊值除外。

trans-unit.source: Target value
trans-unit.target: 目標值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 說明

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in a new window without frames.
trans-unit.target: 呈現在新視窗中沒有框架的內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.
trans-unit.target: 呈現父代的 即時運算框架組中的內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the search pane.
trans-unit.target: 轉譯 [搜尋] 窗格中的內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: 呈現具有焦點的框架中的內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the full window without frames.
trans-unit.target: 呈現框架不完整的視窗中的內容。

trans-unit.source: Check your browser documentation to determine if the <xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""></xref> value is supported.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否<xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""></xref>支援值。

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5.0 and later supports the <xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""></xref> target value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 版和更新版本支援<xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""></xref>目標值。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，會重新整理的視窗或具有焦點的框架。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要繫結至資料來源的欄位名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target*>屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref>物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the TargetField property to specify the field name to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用 TargetField 屬性指定欄位名稱，即可將繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property is used to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content that is linked to a node when that node is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>屬性用來指定視窗或框架中顯示 Web 內容的連結節點時，按一下該節點。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override the TargetField property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地設定覆寫 TargetField 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the TargetField property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field, you can set <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property to a fixed value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用 TargetField 屬性要繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件欄位中，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>屬性設定為固定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Target%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果資料來源包含多個欄位，您必須先設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>屬性或這兩個屬性，才能繫結至適當的欄位。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至欄位的名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target*>屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref>物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target*>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the TargetField property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未設定 TargetField 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示的節點的文字<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the Text property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用文字屬性指定的值繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property is used to specify the text displayed in a node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>屬性用來指定節點中顯示的文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override the Text property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地設定覆寫文字屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the Text property to bind the same text to each node, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TextField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用文字屬性要繫結至每個節點的相同的文字，您可以繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>藉由設定資料來源的欄位物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TextField%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.TextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 如需讓節點的工具提示文字<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the ToolTip property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未設定 ToolTip 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要繫結至資料來源的欄位名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip*>屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref>物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the ToolTipField property to specify the field name to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用 ToolTipField 屬性指定欄位名稱，即可將繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text is displayed when the mouse pointer is positioned over the node.
trans-unit.target: 當滑鼠指標的節點上方時，會顯示工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override the ToolTipField property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地設定覆寫 ToolTipField 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the ToolTipField property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A> property to a fixed value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用 ToolTipField 屬性要繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件欄位中，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A>屬性設定為固定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the data source contains multiple fields, you must first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both properties in order to bind to the appropriate field.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果資料來源包含多個欄位，您必須先設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A>屬性或這兩個屬性，才能繫結至適當的欄位。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至欄位的名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip*>屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref>物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ToolTip*>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the ToolTipField property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未設定 ToolTipField 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember*> property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember*> property. If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.DataMember*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or an empty string (""), **(Empty)** is returned.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<> *> 屬性。如果<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或空字串 ("")， **（空白）**傳回。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a displayed value that is not displayed but is used to store any additional data about a node to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> object is applied, such as data used for handling postback events.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示的值，則不會顯示，但用來儲存相關節點的任何其他資料<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>會套用到物件，例如用來處理回傳事件資料。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, use the Value property to specify the value to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項所繫結至資料來源，請使用 「 值 」 屬性指定繫結至值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This binding relationship affects all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此繫結的關聯性會影響所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>物件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property is used to supplement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property by storing any additional data associated with the node to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性用來補充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>屬性所儲存的節點相關聯的任何其他資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>物件套用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events.
trans-unit.target: 此值不會顯示在控制項中，通常用來儲存資料處理回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override the Value property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of each node directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您可以選擇性地覆寫值 屬性設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>直接每個節點的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the Value property to bind the same value to each node, you can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 除了使用 [值] 屬性將相同的值繫結至每個節點，您可以繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>藉由設定資料來源的欄位物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.ValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>

trans-unit.target: 目標節點的相關的補充資料<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>物件套用; 這項資料不會顯示。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。
